channel.title: Background
channel.description:
can anyone make me a cool background?? and can it have "PkScape" in big letters?? :0 if you can, feel free to give yourself credits in the picture... also... can you change the text "YanilleScape" to "PkScape" in these images?? http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/free_cc_09.png http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/freeshim_cc_09.png thanks a million...
zach
